content: Can anyone name a SMART App in the galery that writes back into the EHR? ...or are these all merely "consuming"resources?

I think everything interesting in our gallery right now is read-only -- but the server does support writes (we reset the state each morning) if you want to experiment with it. The caveat is that EHR vendor SMART implementations support only very limited writes (or none).
The 'EnrG | Rheum' SMART app writes a clinical note back into the EHR. That app isn't runnable in the gallery, but I know the production version of that app does that.
I just opened a topic on Argonaut asking this question.. see "SMART dataflow into EHR" https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/near/33921/stream/argonaut/topic/SMART.20data.20flow.20into.20EHR.3F
